dwelling.name: Cursed Temple
dwelling.description: Gives skeletons to a visiting hero for free once per week

dwelling.name: Graveyard
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit walking dead. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Tomb of Souls
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit wights. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Estate
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit vampires. Replenishes every week

dwelling.name: Mausoleum
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit liches. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several liches

dwelling.name: Hall of Darkness
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit black knights. Replenishes every week. Guarded by several black knights

dwelling.name: Dragon Vault
dwelling.description: Allows visiting heroes to recruit bone dragons. Replenishes every week. Guarded by a few bone dragons
